fields.name: Caching
fields.description:
Specifies the caching requirements.

Possible values are:

**None**

**ReadOnly**

**ReadWrite**

Default: **None for Standard storage. ReadOnly for Premium storage**

fields.name: DiskIOPSReadWrite
fields.description: Specifies the Read-Write IOPS for the managed disk. Should be used only when StorageAccountType is UltraSSD_LRS. If not specified, a default value would be assigned based on diskSizeGB.

fields.name: DiskMBpsReadWrite
fields.description: Specifies the bandwidth in MB per second for the managed disk. Should be used only when StorageAccountType is UltraSSD_LRS. If not specified, a default value would be assigned based on diskSizeGB.

fields.name: DiskSizeGB
fields.description:
Specifies the size of an empty data disk in gigabytes. This element can be used to overwrite the size of the disk in a virtual machine image.

This value cannot be larger than 1023 GB

fields.name: Lun
fields.description: Specifies the logical unit number of the data disk. This value is used to identify data disks within the VM and therefore must be unique for each data disk attached to a VM.

fields.name: WriteAcceleratorEnabled
fields.description: Specifies whether writeAccelerator should be enabled or disabled on the disk.
